channel.title: CVE Feed for PTC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PTC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-25251|2024-09-16T18:23:55.980Z -- ptc -- axeda%20agent
item.description: When connecting to a certain port Axeda agent (All versions) and Axeda Desktop Server for Windows (All versions) may allow an attacker to send certain XML messages to a specific port without proper authentication. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to read and modify the affected productâ€™s configuration.

item.title: CVE-2022-25249|2024-09-16T17:42:41.439Z -- ptc -- axeda%20agent
item.description: When connecting to a certain port Axeda agent (All versions) and Axeda Desktop Server for Windows (All versions) (disregarding Axeda agent v6.9.2 and v6.9.3) is vulnerable to directory traversal, which could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to obtain file system read access via web server..

item.title: CVE-2022-25248|2024-09-16T17:39:10.677Z -- ptc -- axeda%20agent
item.description: When connecting to a certain port Axeda agent (All versions) and Axeda Desktop Server for Windows (All versions) supplies the event log of the specific service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6098|2024-08-19T17:32:48.721Z -- ptc -- kepware%20thingworx%20kepware%20server
item.description: When performing an online tag generation to devices which communicate using the ControlLogix protocol, a machine-in-the-middle, or a device that is not configured correctly, could deliver a response leading to unrestricted or unregulated resource allocation. This could cause a denial-of-service condition and crash the Kepware application. By default, these functions are turned off, yet they remain accessible for users who recognize and require their advantages.

item.title: CVE-2024-3951|2024-08-01T20:26:57.164Z -- ptc -- codebeamer
item.description: PTC Codebeamer is vulnerable to a cross site scripting vulnerability that could allow an attacker to inject and execute malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2024-3951|2024-06-04T17:33:21.406Z -- ptc -- codebeamer
item.description: PTC Codebeamer is vulnerable to a cross site scripting vulnerability that could allow an attacker to inject and execute malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2024-6071|2024-06-28T15:26:22.615Z -- ptc -- creo%20elements%2Fdirect%20license
item.description: PTC Creo Elements/Direct License Server exposes a web interface which can be used by unauthenticated remote attackers to execute arbitrary OS commands on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-6071|2024-08-01T21:25:03.240Z -- ptc -- creo%20elements%2Fdirect%20license
item.description: PTC Creo Elements/Direct License Server exposes a web interface which can be used by unauthenticated remote attackers to execute arbitrary OS commands on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-6098|2024-08-16T14:57:51.023Z -- ptc -- kepware%20thingworx%20kepware%20server
item.description: When performing an online tag generation to devices which communicate using the ControlLogix protocol, a machine-in-the-middle, or a device that is not configured correctly, could deliver a response leading to unrestricted or unregulated resource allocation. This could cause a denial-of-service condition and crash the Kepware application. By default, these functions are turned off, yet they remain accessible for users who recognize and require their advantages.
